info.title: PrimeForge Work-UK API
info.description:
The PrimeForge Work-UK Service provides UK government compliance and regulatory features for the PrimeForge platform.

## Features
- UK Standard Occupational Classification (SOC 2020) codes
- Healthcare Worker codes (HC997)
- UK employment law compliance
- HMRC integration support
- UK visa and immigration status tracking
- National Insurance number validation
- UK payroll regulations
- Statutory payment calculations

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the access token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>`

## Rate Limiting
- General endpoints: 100 requests per minute per user
- Compliance endpoints: 50 requests per minute per user
- Admin endpoints: 50 requests per minute per admin user

## Multi-tenancy
This service supports multi-tenancy. The tenant context is automatically extracted from the JWT token.

## UK Compliance Standards
- SOC 2020: Standard Occupational Classification
- HC997: Healthcare Worker categorization
- HMRC: Her Majesty's Revenue and Customs requirements
- UK GDPR: Data protection regulations
